data.name: World of Warships - Texas Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

This package contains:

  • Texas, Tier V American Battleship
  • 1 Port Slot
  • Stars and Stripes Permanent Camouflage
  • 1 Commander with 6 skill points

Confidently steam your way across the dangerous high seas! The last remaining Dreadnought-style capital ship in existence, Texas is an iconic symbol of American naval might. Take her home along with the very American Stars and Stripes permanent camo and a skilled Commander!

The Stars and Stripes camouflage provides the following bonuses:
  • +50% to experience earned in battle
  • −10% to the cost of the ship's post-battle service
  • −3% to surface detectability range
  • +4% to maximum dispersion of shells fired by the enemy at your ship
data.about_the_game:
This DLC is not compatible with an account created outside of Steam.

This package contains:

  • Texas, Tier V American Battleship

The Stars and Stripes camouflage provides the following bonuses:

data.short_description: The last remaining Dreadnought-style capital ship in existence, Texas is an iconic symbol of American naval might. Take her home along with the very American Stars and Stripes permanent camo and a skilled Commander!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Czech, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*, Thai, Turkish, Spanish - Spain, Korean*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese*, Italian*, Simplified Chinese*, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 x86
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.7 GHz, AMD Athlon II 3 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8800GT/9600GT, IntelHD 4000, NVIDIA GeForce 620M, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 x64 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570, AMD six-core 3,5 Ghz (AMD FX 6300)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 550 Ti, GeForce GTX 560M, AMD Radeon R7 250
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
